SectionBody.Text: Every rating organization shall notify the office promptly of every change in:

Subsection.Text: Its constitution, its articles of agreement or association, or its certificate of incorporation, and its bylaws, rules and regulations governing the conduct of its business;
Its list of members and subscribers; and
The name and address of the resident of this state designated by it upon whom notices or orders of the office or process affecting such rating organization may be served.
